document.docAuthor: Brewer, Michael S., Sierwald, Petra & Bond, Jason E.
document.masterDocTitle: A generic homonym concerning chordeumatid millipedes (Arthropoda: Diplopoda) and ophellid worms (Annelida: Polycheata)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A generic homonym concerning chordeumatid millipedes (Arthropoda: Diplopoda) and ophellid worms (Annelida: Polycheata)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Euzonus
Grube, 1866
: 43
, 64. Type species:
Euzonus arcticus
, by original designation. Preoccupied by
Euzonus
Menge, 1854
: 14
(Diplopoda, Chordeumatida )

Thoracophelia
Ehlers, 1897
: 7
, 101. Type species:
Thoracophelia furcifera
Ehlers, 1897
, by original designation; considered a subgenus of
Euzonus
Grube, 1866
by
Hartman ( 1956 : 293 )
.

Pectinophelia
Hartman, 1938
: 108
. Type species:
Pectinophelia dillonensis
Hartman, 1938
, by original designation. Junior subjective synonym of
Euzonus
Grube, 1866
according to
Hartman ( 1959 : 434 )
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hartman ( 1938 : 103 )
described the genus
Pectinophelia
and listed distinguishing characters between the genera
Pectinophelia
and
Thoracophelia .
Hartman ( 1944 )
considered both genera closely related. The polychaete genus
Thoracophelia
Ehlers, 1897
was treated as a subgenus of
Euzonus
Grube, 1866
by
Hartman ( 1956 : 293 )
who cited distinguishing features between members of the subgenera
Thoracophelia
and ‘
Euzonus sensu stricu .
’ Later,
Hartman ( 1959 : 434 )
synonymized
Pectinophelia
under
‘ Euzonus .’
In subsequent publications, the subgeneric structure of
Euzonus
Grube, 1866
was mostly maintained (e.g.
Hartman 1966
: 51, 1967 : 137 and
Rozbaczylo & Zamorano 1970
) but not always (e.g.
Blake 2000
;
Misaka & Sato 2003
; and
Hartmann-Schröder 1971
: 383 who placed the genera
Euzonus
and
Ophelia
Savigny, 1818
in the then new subfamily Opheliinae without any reference to the subgenus
Thoracophelia
). In a subsequent publication,
Hartmann-Schröder & Parker ( 1995 : 2 )
refer to the subgenus again.

Currently, 15 species are placed in
Euzonus
Grube, 1866
(
Fauchald & Bellan 2009
)
:

Euzonus (Euzonus) dillonensis (
Hartman, 1938
)
Subgenus
Euzonus ( Thoracophelia )
